Summary: If you're allergic to egg yolks, this is your mayo!
Text:
This mayo is made with egg whites and no yolks, hard to find a good tasting mayo without them being front and center. I tried MANY yolkless mayos before this and had given up hope of ever finding one I could stand. I am so glad I tried this, it is the best mayo I have ever had out of a jar! I am so excited to be able to have a seafood salad sandwich again :)

This tastes better than regular Hellmans/Best Foods mayo, and it tastes nothing like Miracle Whip (which I hate). It is smooth and rich and helps combine any salad-style mix you have going without adding any off flavors. I actually never put mayo on sandwiches before, just used it as an ingredient, but I may start since this is so tasty!

The four-pack is a great value.
